item.Q:
Write the character:
soldiers; a force; an army; weapons; arms; military; warlike
item.A:
bīng
民兵 mínbīng people's militia; militia

zhì
智慧 zhìhuì wisdom; knowledge

item.Q:
Write the character:
mistake; error; to miss; to harm; to delay; to neglect
item.A:
traditional: 誤
wù
错误 (錯誤) cuòwù error; mistake; mistaken

item.Q:

border; place; condition; boundary; circumstances; territory
item.A:
jìng
环境 (環境) huánjìng environment; circumstances; surroundings

item.Q:
Write the character:
nature's color; green or blue; greenish black; youth; young (of people); abbr. for Qinghai province 青海
item.A:
qīng
青年 qīngnián youth

item.Q:
Write the character: shùn
(shùnxù de shùn)
item.A:
顺 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 順
to obey; to follow; to arrange; to make reasonable; along; favorable
顺序 (順序) shùnxù sequence; order
bīnglì military strength; armed forces; troops

traditional: 兵員
bīngyuán soldiers; troops
bīngqì weaponry; weapons; arms

traditional: 兵團
bīngtuán large military unit; formation; corps; army
bīngshì ordinary soldier
bīngjīa military strategist in ancient China; military commander; soldier

traditional: 兵書
bīngshū a book on the art of war

traditional: 兵權
bīngquán military leadership; military power
bīngfǎ art of war; military strategy and tactics

traditional: 兵種
bīngzhǒng (military) branch of the armed forces

traditional: 兵變
bīngbiàn mutiny
bīngbù the Ministry of War in feudal China

traditional: 兵馬
bīngmǎ troops and horses; military forces
chūbīng send troops
shìbīng soldier
gōngbīng military engineer
xīnbīng new (army) recruit

traditional: 標兵
biāobīng parade guards (usually spaced out along parade routes); example; model; pacesetter
bùbīng infantry; foot; infantryman; foot soldier
mínbīng people's militia; militia
shuǐbīng enlisted sailor in navy

traditional: 練兵
liànbīng to drill troops; army training
lǎobīng veteran
cáizhì ability and wisdom
míngzhì sensible; wise; judicious; sagacious
zhìlì Chile
zhìlì intelligence; intellect
zhìqǔ circumvent
zhìyù intellectual development

zhìnéng intelligent
zhìněng intelligent

traditional: 機智
jīzhì quick-witted; tact; witty; resourceful
lǐzhì reason; intellect; rationality

traditional: 失誤
shīwù lapse; mistake; fault; to make a mistake

traditional: 無誤
wúwù verified; unmistaken

traditional: 誤差
wùchā (n) difference; inaccuracy; error

traditional: 誤會
wùhuì to misunderstand; to mistake; misunderstanding

traditional: 誤解
wùjiě misunderstanding

traditional: 錯誤
cuòwù error; mistake; mistaken
rùjìng enter a country
chūjìng (v) leave a country or region

traditional: 國境
guójìng national border; frontier

traditional: 地理環境
dìlǐhuánjìng geographic setting

jìngdi circumstances
jìngdì circumstances

traditional: 境況
jìngkuàng circumstances
jìngjiè boundary; state; realm

traditional: 夢境
mèngjìng dreamland
jīajìng family financial situation; family circumstances
qíngjìng situation; atmosphere
yìjìng artistic mood or conception; creative concept

traditional: 環境
huánjìng environment; circumstances; surroundings

traditional: 絕境
juéjìng rattrap

traditional: 處境
chǔjìng plight

traditional: 過境
guòjìng transit; pass through a country's territory

traditional: 邊境
biānjìng frontier; border
zhōngqīngnián middle-aged

traditional: 共青團
gòngqīngtuán the Communist Youth League
chángqīng ever-green
niánqīng youthful
zhīqīng educated youth (sent to work in farms during cultural revolution)

traditional: 萬古長青
wàngǔchángqīng remain fresh; last forever; eternal

qīngshàonián an adolescent; a youth; young person; teenage
qīngshǎonián teenager
qīngnián youth
qīngniánrén youth as a group

Qīnghǎi Qinghai province (Tsinghai) in west China, abbr. 青, capital Xining 西寧|西宁
qīnghǎi Qinghai
qīnghuā blue and white (porcelain)

traditional: 青魚
qīngyú herring

traditional: 青龍
qīnglóng Azure Dragon (Chinese constellation)

traditional: 和順
Héshùn (N) Heshun (place in Shanxi)
héshùn Heshun

traditional: 平順
Píngshùn (N) Pingshun (place in Shanxi)
píngshùn Pingshun

traditional: 長順
Chángshùn (N) Changshun (place in Guizhou)

traditional: 順便
shùnbiàn conveniently; in passing

traditional: 順利
shùnlì smoothly; without a hitch

traditional: 順口
shùnkǒu to read smoothly (of text); to blurt out (without thinking); to suit one's taste (of food)

traditional: 順從
shùncóng obedient; to comply; to submit

traditional: 順德
Shùndé (N) Shunde (city in Guangdong)

traditional: 順應
shùnyìng comply with; be in conformance with

traditional: 順手
shùnshǒu handy; convenient and easy to use; smoothly

traditional: 順次
shùncì in order; in proper sequence

traditional: 順水
shùnshuǐ with the current

traditional: 順治
Shùnzhì reign name of second Qing emperor (1644--1662)

traditional: 順眼
shùnyǎn pleasing to the eye; nice to look at

traditional: 順著
shùnzhe to follow; following; along

traditional: 順路
shùnlù by the way; while out doing sth else; conveniently

traditional: 順風
shùnfēng bon voyage; (n) tail wind
